title: Transfer process ?!
body:
Hello guys, I have a problem. Wanted to log in yesterday but when I tried, I´ve got a reply: "Your account is in the process of transferring ...." But I didn´t transfer my acc at all! I can´t even log in on the website, because my name and password cannot be found in any region. Even when I changed my password through "forgot password" option, still I can´t log in :( 
I´m writting from my secondary acc. Thanks for any advice :) {{champion:32}}

replies.body: That sounds pretty scary, but don't worry we can help!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can review your case, update your info, and transfer you back.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Ok, I did it. Thanks for helping me, I hope it will work. :(
